Generation VIII.Sword: All over the world, there are legends that tell of Regigigas creating other Pokémon in its own image. *
Generation VIII.Shield: It's said that Regigigas created other Pokémon from many different materials before it moved the continents to where they are today. *

Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: According to legend, Regigigas pulled landmasses together and bound them with rope to create the continent of Hisui. Though I have my doubts, the story could well contain a shred of truth.
